messages.title: ACROSS THE UK THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS ARE WINNING
messages.content: There is an alternative to Boris Johnson's Tories. Millions of people are switching to back a better future with the Liberal Democrats.

messages.title: THE KEY QUESTION
messages.content: Who can really beat the Tories here? There's only one answer...
Only Pippa Heylings can beat the Tories here

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for Labour here lets the Tories win.

issues.brexitEurope: WE DESERVE BETTER THAN THE TORIES' BREXIT MESS. 'Donald Trump backs Johnson’s Brexit strategy.' 'Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit.'
issues.education: As your MP, Pippa will fight to stop Brexit, combat the climate emergency, secure more investment for our schools and NHS.
issues.environment: As your MP, Pippa will fight to stop Brexit, combat the climate emergency, secure more investment for our schools and NHS.
issues.health: As your MP, Pippa will fight to stop Brexit, combat the climate emergency, secure more investment for our schools and NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Pippa Heylings is a breath of fresh air – she isn't a career politician and has built a reputation as someone who can deliver real change for local people.
leaflet.additionalNotes: LIB DEM RECORD IN 2019: Gaining 700+ new councillors in the local elections. Winning by-elections in Shetland and Brecon. New MPs joining the Lib Dems from both Labour and the Conservatives. Record high membership, 40,000 people have joined in recent months. Best ever election result in SCOTLAND.
